상위직

PRESTIGE CLASSES

상위직 offer a new form of multiclassing. Unlike the basic classes, characters must meet 필요조건 before they can take their first 레벨 of a prestige class. The rules for 레벨 성장 apply to this system, meaning the first step of 성장 is always choosing a class. If a character does not meet 필요조건 for a prestige class before that first step, that character cannot take the first 레벨 of that prestige class.  Taking a prestige class does not incur the experience point 페널티 normally associated with multiclassing.

용어 정의

Definitions of Terms

Here are definitions of some terms used in this section.

Base Class: One of the standard eleven classes.

시전자 레벨: Generally equal to the number of 직업 레벨(see below) in a spellcasting class. Some 상위직 add 시전자 레벨 to an existing class.

Character 레벨: The total 레벨 of the character, which is the sum of all 직업 레벨 held by that character.

직업 레벨: 레벨 of a character in a particular class. For a character with 레벨 in only one class, 직업 레벨 and character 레벨 are the same.

비전 궁수

ARCANE ARCHER

히트 다이스: d8.

필요조건
Requirements

To qualify to become an 비전 궁수, a character must fulfill all the following criteria.

Race: 엘프 or 하프 엘프.

기본 공격 보너스: +6.

특기: 영점 사격, 정밀 사격, 무기 집중(롱보우 or 숏보우).

주문: Ability to cast 1st-레벨 비전 주문.

직업 스킬
Class Skills

비전 궁수의 직업 스킬(핵심 능력): 제작(Int), 숨기(Dex). 듣기(Wis), 조용히 이동(Dex), 탑승(Dex), 감지(Wis), 생존(Wis), and 밧줄 사용(Dex).

Skill Points at Each 레벨: 4 + Int 수정치.

직업 특기
Class Features

비전 궁수 prestige class의 직업 특기은 다음과 같습니다.

무기와 갑옷 숙련: An 비전 궁수 is proficient with all simple and 무예 무기, 경량 갑옷, medium 갑옷, and 방패.

Enhance Arrow (Su): At 1 레벨, every nonmagical arrow an 비전 궁수 nocks and lets 비행 becomes magical, gaining a +1 enhancement 보너스. Unlike 마법 무기 created by normal means, the archer need not spend experience points or gold pieces to accomplish this task. However, an archer의 magic arrows only function for her. For every two 레벨 the character advances past 1 레벨 in the prestige class, the magic arrows she creates gain +1 상급 potency (+1 at 1 레벨, +2 at 3rd 레벨, +3 at 5th 레벨, +4 at 7 레벨, and +5 at 9th 레벨).

Imbue Arrow (Sp): At 2nd 레벨, an 비전 궁수 gains the ability to place an 범위 spell upon an arrow. When the arrow is fired, the spell의 범위 is centered on where the arrow lands, even if the spell could normally be centered only on the caster. This ability allows the archer to use the bow의 거리 rather than the spell의 거리. It takes a standard action to cast the spell and fire the arrow. The arrow must be fired in the round the spell is cast, or the spell is wasted.

Seeker Arrow (Sp): At 4 레벨, an 비전 궁수 can launch an arrow once per day at a target known to her within 거리, and the arrow travels to the target, even around corners. Only an unavoidable obstacle or the limit of the arrow의 거리 prevents the arrow의 flight. This ability negates 엄폐 and 은폐 수정치, but otherwise 공격 is rolled normally. Using this ability is a standard action (and shooting the arrow is part of the action).

Phase Arrow (Sp): At 6th 레벨, an 비전 궁수 can launch an arrow once per day at a target known to her within 거리, and the arrow travels to the target in a straight path, passing through any nonmagical barrier or wall in its way. (Any magical barrier stops the arrow.) This ability negates 엄폐, 은폐, and even 갑옷 수정치, but otherwise 공격 is rolled normally.

Using this ability is a standard action (and shooting the arrow is part of the action).

Hail of Arrows (Sp): In lieu of her regular 공격, once per day an 비전 궁수 of 8th 레벨 or higher can fire an arrow at each and every target within 거리, to a maximum of one target for every 비전 궁수 레벨 she has earned. Each 공격 uses the archer의 primary 공격 보너스, and each enemy may only be targeted by a single arrow.

Arrow of Death (Sp): At 10 레벨, an 비전 궁수 can create an arrow of death that forces the target, if damaged by the arrow의 공격, to make a DC 20 Fortitude save or be slain immediately. It takes one day to make an arrow of death, and the arrow only functions for 비전 궁수 who created it. The arrow of death lasts no longer than one year, and the archer can only have one such arrow in existence at a time.

비전 도적

ARCANE TRICKSTER

히트 다이스: d4.

필요조건
Requirements

To qualify to become an 비전 도적, a character must fulfill all of the following criteria.

성향: 질서를 제외한 모든 성향

스킬: 문자 해독 7 ranks, 장치 무력화 7 ranks, 탈출 전문가 7 ranks, 지식(arcana) 4 ranks.

주문: Ability to cast 마법사의 손 and at least one arcane spell of 3rd 레벨 or higher.

특수: 은밀한 공격 +2d6.

직업 스킬
Class Skills

비전 도적의 직업 스킬(핵심 능력): 감정(Int), 균형(Dex), 허세(Cha), 등반 (Str), 집중(Con), 제작(Int), 문자 해독(Int), 외교(Cha), 장치 무력화(Int), 변장(Cha), 탈출 전문가 (Dex), 정보 수집(Cha), 숨기(Dex), 도약(Str), 지식(all 스킬 taken individually) (Int), 듣기(Wis), 조용히 이동(Dex), 자물쇠 열기(Dex), 전문직(Wis), 의도 파악(Wis), 탐색(Int), 날렵한 손재주(Dex), 언어 말하기 (Int), 주문학(Int), 감지(Wis), 수영(Str), 재주넘기(Dex), and 밧줄 사용(Dex).

Skill Points at Each 레벨: 4 + Int 수정치.

직업 특기
Class Features

비전 도적 prestige class의 직업 특기은 다음과 같습니다.

무기와 갑옷 숙련: 비전 도적 gain no proficiency with any weapon or 갑옷.

주문 per Day: When a new 비전 도적 레벨 is gained, the character gains 새로운 주문 per day as if he had also gained a 레벨 in a spellcasting class he belonged to before adding the prestige class. He does not, however, gain any other benefit a character of that class would have gained, except for an increased effective 레벨 of spellcasting. If a character had more than one spellcasting class before becoming an 비전 도적, he must decide to which class he adds the new 레벨 for 목적 of determining 주문 per day.

Ranged Legerdemain: An 비전 도적 can 공연 one of the following 직업 스킬 at a 거리 of 30 feet: 장치 무력화, 자물쇠 열기, or 날렵한 손재주. Working at a distance increases the normal skill check DC by 5, and an 비전 도적 cannot take 10 on this check. Any object to be manipulated must weigh 5 pounds or less.

An 비전 도적 can use ranged legerdemain once per day initially, twice per day upon attaining 5th 레벨, and three times per day at 9th 레벨 or higher. He can make only one ranged legerdemain skill check each day, and only if he has at least 1 rank in the skill being used.

은밀한 공격: This is exactly like 도적 ability of the same 이름. The extra 피해 dealt increases by +1d6 every other 레벨(2nd, 4th, 6th, 8th, and 10th). If an 비전 도적 gets a 은밀한 공격 보너스 from another source the 보너스 on 피해 stack.

Impromptu 은밀한 공격: Beginning at 3rd 레벨, once per day an 비전 도적 can declare one melee or ranged 공격 he makes to be a 은밀한 공격(the target can be no more than 30 feet distant if the impromptu 은밀한 공격 is a ranged 공격). The target of an impromptu 은밀한 공격 loses any 민첩 보너스 to AC, but only against that 공격. The power can be used against any target, but creatures that are not subject to critical hits take no extra 피해 (though they still lose any 민첩 보너스 to AC against 공격).

At 7 레벨, an 비전 도적 can use this ability twice per day.

대마법사

ARCHMAGE

히트 다이스: d4.

필요조건
Requirements

To qualify to become an 대마법사, a character must fulfill all the following criteria.

 스킬: 지식(arcana) 15 ranks, 주문학 15 ranks.

특기: 스킬 집중(주문학), 주문 집중 in two 학파 of magic.

주문: Ability to cast 7th-레벨 비전 주문, 지식 of 5th-레벨 or higher 주문 from at least five 학파.

직업 스킬
Class Skills

대마법사의 직업 스킬(핵심 능력): 집중(Con), 제작(alchemy) (Int), 지식 (all 스킬 taken individually) (Int), 전문직(Wis), 탐색(Int), and 주문학(Int).

 Skill Points at Each 레벨: 2 + Int 수정치.

직업 특기
Class Features

All the following are 직업 특기 of 대마법사 prestige class.

무기와 갑옷 숙련: 대마법사 gain no proficiency with any weapon or 갑옷.

주문 per Day/주문 Known: When a new 대마법사 레벨 is gained, the character gains 새로운 주문 per day (and 주문 known, if applicable) as if he had also gained a 레벨 in whatever arcane spellcasting class in which he could cast 7th-레벨 주문 before he added the prestige 직업 레벨. He does not, however, gain any other benefit a character of that class would have gained. If a character had more than one arcane spellcasting class in which he could cast 7th-레벨 주문 before he became an 대마법사, he must decide to which class he adds each 레벨 of 대마법사 for 목적 of determining 주문 per day.

High Arcana: An 대마법사 gains the opportunity to select a special ability from among those described below by permanently eliminating one existing spell slot (she cannot eliminate a spell slot of higher 레벨 than the highest-레벨 spell she can cast). Each special ability has a minimum required spell slot 레벨, as specified in its 묘사.

An 대마법사 may choose to eliminate a spell slot of a higher 레벨 than that required to gain a type of high arcana.

Arcane Fire (Su): 대마법사 gains the ability to change arcane spell energy into arcane fire, manifesting it as 화살 of raw magical energy. 화살 is a ranged touch 공격 with long 거리(400 feet + 40 feet/레벨 of 대마법사) that deals 1d6 points of 피해 per 직업 레벨 of 대마법사 plus 1d6 points of 피해 per 레벨 of the spell used to create the effect. This ability costs one 9th-레벨 spell slot.

Arcane Reach (Su): 대마법사 can use 주문 with a 거리 of touch on a target up to 30 feet away. 대마법사 must make a ranged touch 공격. Arcane reach can be selected a second time as a special ability, in which case 거리 increases to 60 feet. This ability costs one 7th-레벨 spell slot.

Mastery of Counterspelling: When 대마법사 주문 무효화 a spell, it is turned back upon the caster as if it were fully affected by a 주문 반사 spell. If the spell cannot be affected by 주문 반사, then it is merely counterspelled. This ability costs one 7th-레벨 spell slot.

Mastery of Elements: 대마법사 can alter an arcane spell when cast so that it utilizes a different element from the one it normally uses. This ability can only alter a spell with the acid, cold, fire, electricity, or sonic descriptor. The spell의 시전 시간 is unaffected. The caster decides whether to alter the spell의 energy type and chooses the new energy type when he begins casting. This ability costs one 8th-레벨 spell slot.

Mastery of Shaping: 대마법사 can alter 범위 and effect 주문 that use one of the following shapes: 폭발, cone, cylinder, emanation, or spread. The alteration consists of creating spaces within the spell의 범위 or effect that are not subject to the spell. The minimum dimension for these spaces is a 5-foot cube. Furthermore, any shapeable 주문 have a minimum dimension of 5 feet instead of 10 feet. This ability costs one 6th-레벨 spell slot.

Spell Power: This ability increases 대마법사의 effective 시전자 레벨 by +1 (for 목적 of determining 레벨-dependent spell variables such as 피해 주사위 or 거리, and 시전자 레벨 checks only). This ability costs one 5th-레벨 spell slot.

유사주문 Ability: An 대마법사 who selects this type of high arcana can use one of her arcane spell slots (other than a slot expended to learn this or any other type of high arcana) to permanently prepare one of her 비전 주문 as a 유사주문 ability that can be used twice per day. 대마법사 does not use any 구성요소 when casting the spell, although a spell that costs XP to cast still does so and a spell with a costly material component instead costs her 10 times that amount in XP. This ability costs one 5th-레벨 spell slot.

The 유사주문 ability normally uses a spell slot of the spell의 레벨, although 대마법사 can choose to make a spell modified by a 메타마법 feat into a 유사주문 ability at the appropriate spell 레벨.

대마법사 may use an available higher-레벨 spell slot in order to use the 유사주문 ability more often. Using a slot three 레벨 higher than the chosen spell allows her to use the 유사주문 ability four times per day, and a slot six 레벨 higher lets her use it six times per day.

If 유사주문 ability is selected more than one time as a high arcana choice, this ability can apply to the same spell chosen the first time (increasing the number of times per day it can be used) or to a different spell.

암살자

ASSASSIN

히트 다이스: d6.

필요조건
Requirements

To qualify to become an 암살자, a character must fulfill all the following criteria.

성향: Any evil.

스킬: 변장 4 ranks, 숨기 8 ranks, 조용히 이동 8 ranks.

특수: The character must kill someone for no other reason than to join 암살자.

직업 스킬
Class Skills

암살자의 직업 스킬(핵심 능력): 균형(Dex), 허세(Cha), 등반(Str), 제작 (Int), 문자 해독(Int), 외교(Cha), 장치 무력화(Int), 변장(Cha), 탈출 전문가(Dex), 위조(Int), 정보 수집 (Cha), 숨기(Dex), 위협(Cha), 도약(Str), 듣기(Wis), 조용히 이동(Dex), 자물쇠 열기(Dex), 탐색(Int), 의도 파악(Wis), 날렵한 손재주(Dex), 감지(Wis), 수영(Str), 재주넘기(Dex), 마법 장치 사용(Cha), and 밧줄 사용(Dex).

 Skill Points at Each 레벨: 4 + Int 수정치.

직업 특기
Class Features

암살자 prestige class의 직업 특기은 다음과 같습니다.

무기와 갑옷 숙련: 암살자 are proficient with the crossbow (hand, 빛, or heavy), 단검 (any type), dart, 레이피어, sap, 숏보우 (normal and composite), and short sword. 암살자 are proficient with 경량 갑옷 but not with 방패.

은밀한 공격: This is exactly like 도적 ability of the same 이름. The extra 피해 dealt increases by +1d6 every other 레벨(2nd, 4th, 6th, 8th, and 10th). If an 암살자 gets a 은밀한 공격 보너스 from another source 보너스 on 피해 stack.

Death 공격: If an 암살자 studies his victim for 3 rounds and then makes a 은밀한 공격 with a 근접 무기 that successfully deals 피해, the 은밀한 공격 has the additional effect of possibly either paralyzing or killing the target (암살자의 choice). While studying the victim, 암살자 can undertake other actions so long as his attention stays focused on the target and the target does not detect 암살자 or recognize the 암살자 as an enemy. If the victim of such an 공격 fails a Fortitude save (DC 10 + 암살자의 직업 레벨 + 암살자의 Int 수정치) against the kill effect, she dies. If 내성 굴림 fails against 마비 effect, the victim is rendered helpless and unable to act for 1d6 rounds plus 1 round per 레벨 of the 암살자. If the victim의 내성 굴림 succeeds, 공격 is just a normal 은밀한 공격. Once 암살자 has completed the 3 rounds of study, he must make the death 공격 within the next 3 rounds.

If a death 공격 is attempted and fails (the victim makes her save) or if 암살자 does not launch 공격 within 3 rounds of completing the study, 3 new rounds of study are required before he can attempt another death 공격.

독 Use: 암살자 are trained in the use of 독 and never risk accidentally poisoning themselves when applying 독 to a blade.

주문: Beginning at 1 레벨, an 암살자 gains the ability to cast a number of 비전 주문. To 주문 시전, an 암살자 must have an 지능 score of at least 10 + the spell의 레벨, so an 암살자 with an 지능 of 10 or lower cannot cast these 주문. 암살자 보너스 주문 are based on 지능, and 내성 굴림 against these 주문 have a DC of 10 + spell 레벨 + 암살자의 지능 보너스. When 암살자 gets 0 주문 per day of a given spell 레벨 he gains only 보너스 주문 he would be entitled to based on his 지능 score for that spell 레벨.

암살자의 spell list appears below. An 암살자 casts 주문 just as a 음유시인 does.

Upon reaching 6th 레벨, at every even-numbered 레벨 after that (8th and 10th), an 암살자 can choose to learn a new spell in place of one he already knows. The new spell의 레벨 must be the same as that of the spell being exchanged, and it must be at least two 레벨 lower than the highest-레벨 암살자 spell 암살자 can cast. An 암살자 may swap only a single spell at any given 레벨, and must choose whether or not to swap the spell at the same time that he gains 새로운 주문 known for that 레벨.

He cannot, however, 숨기 in his own 어둠.

2nd 레벨: 형체 번형, 고양이의 우아함, 암흑, 여우의 교활함, 환영 문서, 투명화, 흔적 없는 이동, 거미 기어오르기, 성향 탐지 방어.

4 레벨: 투청/투시, 차원의 문, 이동의 자유, 입심, 상급 투명화, 생명체 위치파악, 기억 조작, 독.

BLACKGUARD

필요조건
Requirements

특기: 쪼개기, 향상된 무기 파괴, 강한 공격.

Skill Points at Each 레벨: 2 + Int 수정치.

직업 특기
Class Features

고위급도적 prestige class의 직업 특기은 다음과 같습니다.

무기와 갑옷 숙련: 고위급도적 are proficient with all simple and 무예 무기, with all types of 갑옷, and with 방패.

Aura of Evil (Ex): The power of a 검은경비병의 aura of evil (see the 악 감지 spell) is equal to his 직업 레벨 plus his 사제 레벨, if any.

선 감지 (Sp): At will, a 고위급도적 can use 선 감지 as a 유사주문 ability, duplicating the effect of the 선 감지 spell.

독 Use: 고위급도적 are skilled in the use of 독 and never risk accidentally poisoning themselves when applying 독 to a blade.

Dark Blessing (Su): A 고위급도적 applies his 매력 수정치 (if positive) as 보너스 on all 내성 굴림.

주문: A 고위급도적 has the ability to cast a small number of 신성 주문. To cast a 고위급도적 spell, a 고위급도적 must have a 지혜 score of at least 10 + the spell의 레벨, so a 고위급도적 with a 지혜 of 10 or lower cannot cast these 주문.

고위급도적 보너스 주문 are based on 지혜, and 내성 굴림 against these 주문 have a DC of 10 + spell 레벨 + the 검은경비병의 지혜 수정치. When 고위급도적 gets 0 주문 per day of a given spell 레벨 he gains only the 보너스 주문 he would be entitled to based on his 지혜 score for that spell 레벨. 검은경비병의 spell list appears below. A 고위급도적 has access to any spell on the list and can freely choose which to prepare, just as a 사제. A 고위급도적 prepares and casts 주문 just as a 사제 does (though a 고위급도적 cannot spontaneously cast 치유 or 상처 가하기 주문).

선 처벌 (Su): Once a day, a 고위급도적 of 2nd 레벨 or higher may attempt to 선 처벌 with one normal melee 공격.

He adds his 매력 수정치 (if positive) to his 명중 굴림 and deals 1 extra point of 피해 per 직업 레벨. If a 고위급도적 accidentally smites a creature that is not good, the smite has no effect but it is still used up for that day.

At 5th 레벨, and again at 10 레벨, a 고위급도적 may 선 처벌 one additional time per day.

Aura of Despair (Su): Beginning at 3rd 레벨, 고위급도적 radiates a malign aura that causes enemies within 10 feet of him to take a –2 페널티 on all 내성 굴림.

언데드 명령(Su): When a 고위급도적 reaches 3rd 레벨, he gains the supernatural ability to 명령 and rebuke undead. He 명령 undead as would a 사제 of two 레벨 lower.

은밀한 공격: This ability, gained at 4 레벨, is like 도적 ability of the same 이름. The extra 피해 increases by +1d6 every third 레벨 beyond 4th (7th and 10th). If a 고위급도적 gets a 은밀한 공격 보너스 from another source 보너스 on 피해 stack.

고위급도적 주문 목록

고위급도적 choose their 주문 from the following list:

1 레벨: 공포 유발, 부패의 무기, 가벼운 상처 치유, 파멸, 가벼운 상처 가하기, 마법 무기, 몬스터 I 소환*.

2nd 레벨: 황소의 근력, 일반적인 상처 치유, 암흑, 죽음을 알리는 종, 독수리의 광휘, 일반적인 상처 가하기, 분쇄, 몬스터 II 소환*.

3rd 레벨: 역병, 심각한 상처 치유, 깊은 암흑, 심각한 상처 가하기, protection from elements, 몬스터 III 소환*.

4 레벨: 치명적인 상처 치유, 이동의 자유, 치명적인 상처 가하기, 독, 몬스터 IV 소환*.

* Evil creatures only.

부패의 무기
Corrupt Weapon

고위급도적 have access to a special spell, 부패의 무기, which is the opposing counterpart of 성기사 spell 무기 축복. Instead of improving a weapon의 effectiveness against evil foes 부패의 무기 makes a weapon more effective against good foes.

타락한 성기사
Fallen Paladins

고위급도적 who have 레벨 in 성기사 class (that is to say, are now 전 성기사) gain extra 능력 the more 레벨 of 성기사 they have.

A fallen 성기사 who becomes a 고위급도적 gains all of the following 능력 that apply, according to the number of 성기사 레벨 the character has.

1–2: 선 처벌 1/일. (This is in addition to the ability granted to all 고위급도적 at 2nd 레벨.

3–4: 치유의 손길. Once per day, 고위급도적 can use this supernatural ability to cure himself or his fiendish servant of 피해 equal to his 매력 보너스 x his 레벨.

5–6: 은밀한 공격 피해 increased by +1d6. 선 처벌 2/일.

7–8: Fiendish summoning. Once per day, 고위급도적 can use a 몬스터 I 소환 spell to call forth an evil creature. For this spell, 시전자 레벨 is double 검은경비병의 직업 레벨.

9–10: Undead companion. In addition to the fiendish servant, 고위급도적 gains (at 5th 레벨) a Medium-size 스켈레톤 or 좀비 as a companion. This companion cannot be turned or rebuked and gains all special 보너스 as a fiendish servant when 고위급도적 gains 레벨. 선 처벌 3/일.

11 or more: A fallen 성기사 of this stature immediately gains a 고위급도적 레벨 for each 레벨 of 성기사 he trades in.

The character 레벨 of the character does not change. With the loss of 성기사 레벨, the character no longer gains as many extra 능력 for being a fallen 성기사.

검은경비병의 마족 하인
The Blackguard의 Fiendish Servant

Upon or after reaching 5th 레벨, a 고위급도적 can call a fiendish 박쥐, 고양이, 흉폭한 시궁쥐, 말, 조랑말, 큰까마귀, or 두꺼비 to serve him. 검은경비병의 servant further gains HD and 특수 능력 based on the 검은경비병의 character 레벨(see the table below).

A 고위급도적 may have only one fiendish servant at a time.

Should 검은경비병의 servant die, he may call for another one after a year and a day. The new fiendish servant has all the accumulated 능력 due a servant of 검은경비병의 current 레벨.

공감 연결 (Su): 고위급도적 has an 공감 연결 with his servant out to a distance of up to 1 mile. 고위급도적 cannot see through the servant의 eyes, but they can communicate empathically. Because of the limited nature of the link, only general emotional content can be communicated.

Because of the 공감 연결 between the servant and 고위급도적, 고위급도적 has the same connection to a place or an item that the servant does.

향상된 회피 (Ex): If the servant is subjected to an 공격 that normally allows a Reflex 내성 굴림 for half 피해, it takes no 피해 on a successful 내성 굴림 and only half 피해 on a failed 내성 굴림. 향상된 회피 is an extraordinary ability.

내성 굴림 공유: For each of its 내성 굴림, the servant uses either its own base save 보너스 or 검은경비병’s, whichever is higher. The servant applies its own 능력 수정치 to 내성 굴림, and it doesn’t share any other 보너스 on 내성 굴림 that 고위급도적 might have.

주문 공유: At 검은경비병의 option, he may have any spell (but not any 유사주문 ability) he casts on himself also affect his servant. The servant must be within 5 feet at the time of casting to receive the benefit. If the spell has a 지속시간 other than instantaneous, it stops affecting the servant if it 이동 farther than 5 feet away and will not affect the servant again even if the servant returns to 고위급도적 before 지속시간 expires. Additionally, 고위급도적 may 주문 시전 with a target of “You” on his servant (as a touch 거리 spell) instead of on himself. A 고위급도적 and his servant can 주문 공유 even if 주문 normally do not affect creatures of the servant의 type (magical beast).

말하기 with 고위급도적(Ex): If 검은경비병의 character 레벨 is 13th or higher, 고위급도적 and servant can communicate verbally as if they were using a common language. Other creatures do not understand the communication without magical help.

Blood Bond (Ex): If 검은경비병의 character 레벨 is 16th or higher, the servant gains a +2 보너스 on all 명중 굴림, checks, and 내성 굴림 if it witnesses 고위급도적 being threatened or harmed.

This 보너스 lasts as long as the threat is immediate and apparent.

주문 저항(Ex): If 검은경비병의 character 레벨 is 19th or higher, the servant gains 주문 저항 equal to the 검은경비병의 레벨 + 5. To affect the servant with a spell, another spellcaster must get a result on a 시전자 레벨 check (1d20 + 시전자 레벨) that equals or exceeds the servant의 주문 저항.

직업 특기
Class Features

드래곤 신봉자 prestige class의 직업 특기은 다음과 같습니다.

무기와 갑옷 숙련: 드래곤 신봉자 gain no proficiency with any weapon or 갑옷.

보너스 주문: 드래곤 신봉자 gain 보너스 주문 as they gain 레벨 in this prestige class, as if from having a high ability score, as given on 표: 드래곤 신봉자. 보너스 spell can be added to any 레벨 of 주문 the disciple already has the ability to cast.

If a character has more than one spellcasting class, he must decide to which class he adds each 보너스 spell as it is gained. Once 보너스 spell has been applied, it cannot be shifted.

자연 갑옷 Increase (Ex): At 1st, 4th, and 7 레벨, a gains an increase to the character의 existing 자연 갑옷(if any), as indicated on 표: 드래곤 신봉자(the numbers represent the total increase gained to that point). As his skin thickens, a 드래곤 신봉자 takes on more and more of his progenitor의 physical aspect.

Claws and Bite (Ex): At 2nd 레벨, a 드래곤 신봉자 gains claw and bite 공격 if he does not already have them. Use the values below or the disciple의 base claw and bite 피해 values, whichever are 상급.

Size Bite 피해 Claw 피해
Small 1d4 1d3
Medium 1d6 1d4
Large 1d8 1d6

A 드래곤 신봉자 is considered proficient with these 공격. When making a 전력 공격, a 드래곤 신봉자 uses his full 기본 공격 보너스 with his bite 공격 but takes a –5 페널티 on claw 공격. 다중공격 feat reduces this 페널티 to only –2.

Ability Boost (Ex): As a 드래곤 신봉자 gains 레벨 in this prestige class, his 능력 점수 increase as noted on 표: 드래곤 신봉자.

These increases stack and are gained as if through 레벨 성장.

브레스 무기(Su): At 3rd 레벨, a 드래곤 신봉자 gains a minor 브레스 무기. The type and shape depend on 드래곤 variety whose heritage he enjoys (see below). Regardless of the ancestor, 브레스 무기 deals 2d8 points of 피해 of the appropriate energy type.

At 7 레벨, 피해 increases to 4d8, and when a disciple attains 드래곤 apotheosis at 10 레벨 it reaches its full power at 6d8. Regardless of its 근력, 브레스 무기 can be used only once per day. Use all the rules for 드래곤 브레스 무기 except as specified here.

A successful 내성 굴림 reduces the loss by half, to 100 XP per prestige 직업 레벨. 그림자춤꾼의 XP total can never go below 0 as the result of a 어둠의 차원 강제퇴거 or 파괴. A destroyed or dismissed 어둠 companion cannot be replaced for 30 days.

어둠 도약(Su): At 4 레벨, a 그림자춤꾼 gains the ability to travel between 어둠 as if by means of a 차원의 문 spell. The limitation is that the magical 운송수단 must begin and end in an 범위 with at least some 어둠. A 그림자춤꾼 can 도약 up to a total of 20 feet each day in this way; this may be a single 도약 of 20 feet or two 도약 of 10 feet each. Every two 레벨 higher than 4th, the distance a 그림자춤꾼 can 도약 each day doubles (40 feet at 6th, 80 feet at 8th, and 160 feet at 10th). This amount can be split among many 도약, but each one, no matter how small, counts as a 10-foot increment.

Class Features

All of the following are features of 서마터지스트 prestige class.

무기와 갑옷 숙련: 서마터지스트 gain no proficiency with any weapon or 갑옷.

주문 per Day: When a new 서마터지스트 레벨 is gained, the character gains 새로운 주문 per day as if he had also gained a 레벨 in whatever spellcasting class he belonged to before he added the prestige class. He does not, however, gain any other benefit a character of that class would have gained. This essentially means that he adds 레벨 of 서마터지스트 to 레벨 of whatever other spellcasting class the character has, then determines 주문 per day and 시전자 레벨 accordingly.

If a character had more than one spellcasting class before he became a 서마터지스트, he must decide to which class he adds each 레벨 of 서마터지스트 for 목적 of determining 주문 per day.

Improved Ally: When a 서마터지스트 casts a 이세계 동료 소환 spell (including the 하급 and 상급 versions), he makes a 외교 check to convince the creature to 보조 him for a reduced payment. If 서마터지스트의 외교 check adjusts the creature의 attitude to helpful the creature will work for 50% of the standard fee, as long as the task is one that is not against its nature.

서마터지스트의 improved ally class feature only works when 이세계 동료 소환 shares at least one aspect of 성향 with 서마터지스트.

A 서마터지스트 can have only one such ally at a time, but he may bargain for tasks from other planar allies normally.

증강 소환: At 2nd 레벨, a 서마터지스트 gains 증강 소환 feat.

Extended Summoning: At 3rd 레벨 and higher, all 주문 from the summoning subschool that 서마터지스트 casts have their 지속시간 doubled, as if 주문 시간 연장 feat had been applied to them. 레벨 of the summoning 주문 don’t change, however. This ability stacks with the effect of 주문 시간 연장 feat, which does change the spell의 레벨.

Contingent 소환술: A 4th-레벨 서마터지스트 can prepare a summoning or calling spell ahead of time to be triggered by some other event. This functions as described for the 비상사태 spell, including having 서마터지스트 cast the summoning or calling spell beforehand. The spell is cast instantly when 트리거 event occurs.

상태이상 needed to bring the spell into effect must be clear, although they can be general. If complicated or convoluted condition as are prescribed, the contingent 소환술 may fail when triggered. The 소환술 spell occurs based solely on the stated 상태이상, regardless of whether 서마터지스트 wants it to, although most 소환술 can be dismissed normally. A 서마터지스트 can have only one contingent 소환술 active at a time.

Planar Cohort: A 5th-레벨 서마터지스트 can use any of the 이세계 동료 소환 주문 to call a creature to act as his cohort. The called creature serves loyally and well as long as the 서마터지스트 continues to advance a cause important to the creature.

To call a planar cohort, 서마터지스트 must cast the relevant spell, paying the XP costs normally. It takes an offering of 1,000 gp x the HD of the creature to convince it to serve as a planar cohort, and the improved ally class feature can’t be used to reduce or eliminate this cost. The planar cohort can’t have more 히트 다이스 than 서마터지스트 has, and must have an ECL no higher than 서마터지스트의 character 레벨 –2.

A 서마터지스트 can have only one planar cohort at a time, but he can continue to make agreements with other called creatures normally. A planar cohort replaces a 서마터지스트의 existing cohort, if he has one by 미덕 of 리더십 feat.
